Author: OnTheBrinkOfABurnout
Text: Thanks. My relapse has been kind of strange this time? Like, I just lose my appetite and I feel gross, when I look at food.

Author: lameanonymous
Text: yes very LOL because, you kinda did this too, but I’m rly protective giving friends weight loss advice ??? Like they’ll say “oh I didn’t eat anything but a smoothie today!” And I’ll be like “you don’t need to starve urself to lose weight!! u can just have an 80/20 diet and exercise the way u like :))))” just like SUPER positive things to really keep them away from bad thoughts about food.   It’s good that u referred him to his trainer, sometimes disordered tips can jsut slip out :( I hope ur doing ok in ur relapse :( ❤️
